title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: Dray M (2022). snorkel: RStudio Addins Help Format 'roxygen2'. R package version 0.0.0.9001, https://github.com/co-analysis/snorkel.
code: @Manual{,   title = {snorkel: RStudio Addins To Help Format 'roxygen2'},   author = {Matt Dray},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9001},   url = {https://github.com/co-analysis/snorkel}, }

what: RStudio Addins To Help Format roxygen2
title: RStudio Addins To Help Format roxygen2
text: R package RStudio Addins help insert {roxygen2} formatting function documentation. put snorkel mouth help breathe oxygen; put {snorkel} addins help write {roxygen2}. package aims cover often-used roxygen formatting tags. Learn Writing R extensions site. notice Jozef also created something along lines.

title: RStudio Addins To Help Format roxygen2
text: Install Github : installation, may need restart R. can access {snorkel} functions ‘Addins’ menu RStudio.

title: RStudio Addins To Help Format roxygen2
text: Select text functions script choose addins appropriate function needs. want make word bold, highlight choose ‘Format Bold’ addin. change text bold \strong{bold}, example. Special cases ‘Link Function (Another Package)’ ‘Link Function (Another Package, Show Name)’. need input package name function name ’re linking . , type like ‘package::function’, select choose function want addins menu. Note ‘List’ functions insert example, rather replacing selected text.
